description: The trend has been gaining ground, bolstered by viral TikTok filters and experiential workshops conducted overseas. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: What colours look good on you? Personal colour analysis trend takes off in Singapore
title_page: What colours look good on you? Personal colour analysis trend takes off in Singapore | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – You may have already seen videos of it all over your social media: wide-eyed women sitting in barber shop-like chairs, swathed in a rainbow of fabric swatches.
Behind them stands a consultant layering on colour after colour with military-like precision. “This one makes your face pop; this one makes you look dull.”
